heroSection.title: Manage your finances smartly
heroSection.description: Comprehensive tool for controlling your budget, tracking your assets and achieving financial goals.

addAsApp.title: Add as an app
addAsApp.description: Add our app to your phone to have access to all features.
addAsApp.videoNotSupported: Your browser does not support video.

ctaSection.title: Ready to take control of your finances?
ctaSection.description: Join thousands of users who already use our app and achieve their financial goals.

howItWorksSection.title: How it works?
howItWorksSection.description: Managing finances has never been easier. Our app will guide you through the process.
howItWorksSection.step1Description: Start by creating a budget, specifying the period and adding your income and planned expenses.
howItWorksSection.step2Description: Regularly add your expenses and income to have an up-to-date view of your finances.
howItWorksSection.step3Description: Set financial goals and save money systematically to achieve them in the planned time.

featuresSection.title: Everything you need to manage your finances.
featuresSection.description: Our app offers a comprehensive set of tools that will help you control your finances, plan your expenses and achieve your financial goals.

feature1.title: Budgeting
feature1.description: Create and manage budgets, track your expenses and income to always have control over your finances.

feature2.title: Asset management
feature2.description: Monitor your assets and track changes in your net worth over time.

feature3.title: Financial goals
feature3.description: Set financial goals, monitor progress and get notifications about upcoming deadlines.

feature4.title: Financial analysis
feature4.description: Analyze your expenses, income and debts to make better financial decisions.

feature5.title: Portfolio system
feature5.description: Use the portfolio system to effectively manage money designated for specific goals.

feature6.title: Iron reserve
feature6.description: Build and monitor your financial reserve to be prepared for unexpected expenses.

benefitsSection.title: Benefits of using the app
benefitsSection.description: Our app helps thousands of users better manage their finances and achieve their financial goals.

benefit1.title: Reduction of financial stress
benefit1.description: Planning and controlling finances reduces financial stress associated with uncertainty.

benefit2.title: Full control over finances
benefit2.description: You always know where your money goes and how much you can spend in a given period and category.

benefit3.title: Achieving financial goals
benefit3.description: Systematic saving and monitoring progress helps in achieving financial goals.

benefit4.title: Better financial decisions
benefit4.description: Analysis of expenses and income helps make better financial decisions.

subscription.title: Your subscription for - {familyName}
subscription.yearlyDescription: Best price - pay once a year
subscription.trialDescription: The trial period lasts 7 days and ends on {date}

freeAccountCard.title: Free Account
freeAccountCard.subtitle: Free active account
freeAccountCard.description: You have access to all features without any charges

chooseSubscriptionDialog.title: Select subscription
chooseSubscriptionDialog.description: Your trial period has ended or you do not have an active subscription. Select the subscription that best suits your needs.

structure.financialCushionDetailedInfo: Financial cushion, in this category should be assets that are most liquid and can be easily converted to cash.
structure.livingAssetsDetailedInfo: Living assets, in this category should be assets that are used for daily life, such as a house or a car.
structure.investmentAssetsDetailedInfo: Investment assets, in this category should be assets that are invested for a longer future, such as stocks or bonds.
structure.otherAssetsDetailedInfo: Other assets, in this category should be assets that do not fit into other categories, such as collections or jewelry.

assets.title: Assets
assets.assetsAdditionalInfo: Assets are all your financial resources, such as: money in the bank account, stocks, bonds, real estate and other investments.

noAssetsCard.title: You don't have any assets yet
noAssetsCard.description: Add asset to control your assets.

addAsset.title: Add asset
addAsset.description: Add asset to your assets list.

editAsset.title: Edit asset
editAsset.description: Edit asset from your assets list.

deleteAsset.title: Delete asset
deleteAsset.description: If you added the asset by mistake and want to delete it together with the history, so that there are no traces left -
deleteAsset.totalDeleteDescription: If you want to delete the asset completely, it may affect your account history. If you simply reduced the asset to zero, use the regular delete option.

debts.title: Debts
debts.additionalInfo: Debts are all your financial obligations, such as: remaining amount of a loan together with interest.

noDebtsCard.title: You don't have any debts yet
noDebtsCard.description: Add debt to control your debts.

addDebt.title: Add debt
addDebt.description: Add debt to your debts list.

editDebt.title: Edit debt
editDebt.description: Edit debt from your debts list.

deleteDebt.title: Delete debt
deleteDebt.description: If you added the debt by mistake and want to delete it together with the history, so that there are no traces left -
deleteDebt.totalDeleteDescription: If you want to delete the debt completely, it may affect your account history. If you simply reduced the debt to zero, use the regular delete option.

noGoalsCard.title: You don't have any goals yet
noGoalsCard.description: Add goal to your goals list, to track your financial goals.

scheduleDialog.title: Deposit schedule - {goalName}
scheduleDialog.description: Here you can see the deposit schedule for the goal.

addGoal.title: Add new goal
addGoal.description: Add new goal to your goals list.

valueField.label: Goal amount
valueField.additionalInfo: This field specifies the amount you want to achieve. Include the amount you have already saved.

dateField.label: Target date
dateField.errorMustBeInTheFuture: Date must be in the future.
dateField.additionalInfo: This field specifies the date by which you want to achieve the goal. The goal outcomes in your budget will be planned to achieve this goal by this date.

savingIntervalField.label: Saving interval
savingIntervalField.additionalInfo: This field specifies the frequency of the goal. For example, if you select "monthly", then monthly to your budget will be added an outcome for this goal.

initialDepositField.label: Initial deposit
initialDepositField.additionalInfo: This field specifies the amount you have already saved for this goal.

editGoal.title: Edit goal
editGoal.description: Edit goal from your goals list.

valueField.label: Goal amount
valueField.additionalInfo: This field specifies the amount you want to achieve. Include the amount you have already saved.

dateField.label: Target date
dateField.additionalInfo: This field specifies the date by which you want to achieve the goal. The goal outcomes in your budget will be planned to achieve this goal by this date.

savingIntervalField.label: Saving interval
savingIntervalField.additionalInfo: This field specifies the frequency of the goal. For example, if you select "monthly", then monthly to your budget will be added an outcome for this goal.

initialDepositField.label: Initial deposit
initialDepositField.additionalInfo: This field specifies the amount you have already saved for this goal.

deleteGoal.title: Delete goal
deleteGoal.description: Delete goal from your goals list. All outcomes from previous budget periods will be deleted, which may affect your account history. If you don't want to affect your account history, you can simply delete the future outcomes.

finishGoal.title: Finish goal
finishGoal.description: Finish goal from your goals list.

editGoalOutcome.title: Edit goal outcome
editGoalOutcome.description: Edit goal outcome from your goals list.

fortune.assetsAdditionalInfo: Assets are all your financial resources, such as: money in the bank account, stocks, bonds, real estate and other investments.
fortune.debtsAdditionalInfo: Debts are all your financial obligations, such as: remaining amount of a loan together with interest.

goalsSummaryCard.title: Goals
goalsSummaryCard.noGoals: You don't have any goals yet

financialCushion.title: Financial cushion
financialCushion.description1: Financial cushion should be 3-6 months of spendings to ensure financial security in case of random situations. Currently you have
financialCushion.description3: of the recommended value. For percent age calculations we use financial cushion amounting to 6-times monthly spendings.

settings.noProfilesCardTitle: You don't have any family profile yet
settings.noProfilesCardDescription: Add family profile, to control budget, track assets and achieve your financial goals.

received.title: Family profile invitations
received.noInvitationsDescription: You don't have any invitations yet.

reject.title: Reject invitation
reject.description: Are you sure you want to reject this invitation?

sent.noInvitationsDescription: You don't have any invitations yet.
sent.title: Sent invitations

addFamily.title: Create new family profile
addFamily.description: Family profile allows you to manage finances together with other people.

budgetIntervalField.label: Budget interval
budgetIntervalField.additionalInfo: This field allows you to configure how often a new budget should be created, i.e. in what time intervals we will summarize your expenses and incomes.

budgetTransferPouchBalanceField.label: Transfer pouch balance between budgets
budgetTransferPouchBalanceField.additionalInfo: This field allows you to configure whether the balance of pouches should be transferred to the next budget after the budget period ends. If you choose "yes", if you spend more than planned on a certain goal (e.g. shopping) in a given month, the pouch balance will be reduced by that amount in the next month. It will also work in reverse - if you don't spend the planned amount, the balance will be increased in the next month.

budgetStartDateField.label: Budget start date
budgetStartDateField.additionalInfo: This field allows you to configure which day a new budget period should start. In most cases, the best option will be the 1st day of the month, when you start using the application.

leaveFamily.title: Leave family profile
leaveFamily.description: Are you sure you want to leave this family profile?

inviteUserToFamily.title: Invite user to family profile
inviteUserToFamily.description: Provide email address of the person you want to invite to {familyName} family profile.

removeFamily.title: Remove family profile
removeFamily.description: Are you sure you want to delete this family profile?

removeUserFromFamily.title: Remove user from family profile
removeUserFromFamily.description: Are you sure you want to remove this user from this family profile?

budget.title: Budget
budget.summaryAdditionalInfo: This tab shows a summary of your incomes and outcomes in the current budget period, as indicated in the title below.
budget.budgetItemsAdditionalInfo: This tab is used to configure your budget. You can add your incomes, outcomes and recurring pouches, and thus configure future budgets so that you don't have to add them again for each new budget period (e.g. every month). You can also see all the items you have added, not only those from the current budget, which allows for a complete overview.

noFamilyCard.title: You don't have any family profile yet
noFamilyCard.description: Add family profile, to control budget, track assets and achieve your financial goals.

pouch.title: Pouches
pouch.additionalInfo: Pouches are a special type of outcomes. Pouch has a planned capacity, but it is not added to the sum of outcomes immediately, but as you add outcomes to it. A good example of using pouches is such outcomes as shopping - you can plan an amount you want to spend on shopping in a given month, but only the amount you actually spent (i.e. the sum of outcomes added to this pouch in a given month) will be added to the budget. In the budget settings you can set the option to transfer the pouch balance. This means that if you spend more than planned in a given month, the planned amount for the next month will be reduced by that value. It will also work in reverse - if you don't spend all the planned amount, the surplus will be transferred to the next pouch.

noPouchesCard.title: You don't have any pouches yet
noPouchesCard.description: Add pouches, to control budget, track assets and achieve your financial goals.

budgetSummary.title: Pouches
budgetSummary.listOfPouches: Total amount of pouches in the budget period.
budgetSummary.seeFullList: Click to see the list of expenses in this pouch

removePouchOutcome.title: Remove outcome from pouch
removePouchOutcome.description: Are you sure you want to remove this outcome from pouch?

editPouchOutcome.title: Edit outcome in pouch
editPouchOutcome.description: Edit outcome in pouch, to control budget, track assets and achieve your financial goals.

removePouch.title: Remove pouch
removePouch.descriptionOneTime: Are you sure you want to remove this pouch? This operation cannot be undone.
removePouch.descriptionMultiple: Are you sure you want to remove this pouch? This operation cannot be undone, and it may affect your account history, e.g. by changing the balance of the current or past budget.

addPouchOutcome.title: Add outcome to pouch
addPouchOutcome.description: Select pouch and add outcome in its scope, to control budget, track assets and achieve your financial goals.

addPouch.title: Create new pouch
addPouch.description: Add pouches, to control budget, track assets and achieve your financial goals.

dateField.label: Date
dateField.additionalInfo: This field specifies the date of occurrence. If you selected that it should be a recurring occurrence, this date specifies the first occurrence.

recurrenceField.label: Recurrence
recurrenceField.additionalInfo: This field allows you to configure the recurrence. If something occurs only once, select "one-time". If something occurs multiple times, select "recurring" and specify how often it should occur. In the case of selecting the recurring option, you must configure how many times and how often it should occur.

editPouch.title: Edit pouch
editPouch.description: Unfortunately, due to the correctness of the history of your pouches, not all fields can be changed. To fully edit the pouch, use the stop pouch or delete pouch option, and then create a new one.

dateField.label: Creation date
dateField.additionalInfo: This field specifies the date of occurrence. If you selected that it should be a recurring occurrence, this date specifies the first occurrence.

stopPouch.title: Stop pouch
stopPouch.descriptionAttentionStop: Stopping pouch, it will not be included in the budget from the date you provide.
stopPouch.descriptionAttentionStopPouch: Stopping pouch, it will not be included in the budget from the date you provide.
stopPouch.descriptionDeleteTitle: If you want to completely delete the pouch,
stopPouch.descriptionDeleteAttention: Remember, that completely deleting the pouch may cause changes in the balances of the current and past budgets.

outcomes.title: Expenses
outcomes.additionalInfo: Expenses are a category, to which you should add all expenses, for which you know that you will spend a specific amount, e.g. loan installment or rent. If you don't know how much the expense will be, and you only plan to spend a certain amount on a certain goal, use a pouch.

outcomeCard.goalOutcomeChangeInfo: Changes in goal outcomes are possible from the goals page

noOutcomesCard.title: You don't have any expenses yet
noOutcomesCard.description: Add expenses, to control budget, track assets and achieve your financial goals.

removeOutcome.title: Remove expense
removeOutcome.descriptionOneTime: Are you sure you want to remove this expense? This operation cannot be undone.
removeOutcome.descriptionMultiple: Are you sure you want to remove this expense? This operation cannot be undone, and it may affect your account history, e.g. by changing the balance of the current or past budget.

editOutcome.title: Edit expense
editOutcome.description: Unfortunately, due to the correctness of the history of your expenses, not all fields can be changed. To fully edit the expense, use the stop expense or delete expense option, and then create a new one.

dateField.label: Date
dateField.additionalInfo: This field specifies the date of occurrence. If you selected that it should be a recurring occurrence, this date specifies the first occurrence.

addOutcome.title: Create new expense
addOutcome.description: Add expenses, to control budget, track assets and achieve your financial goals.

dateField.label: Date
dateField.additionalInfo: This field specifies the date of occurrence. If you selected that it should be a recurring occurrence, this date specifies the first occurrence.

recurrenceField.label: Repeat every
recurrenceField.additionalInfo: This field allows you to configure the recurrence. If something occurs only once, select "one-time". If something occurs multiple times, select "recurring" and specify how often it should occur. In the case of selecting the recurring option, you must configure how many times and how often it should occur.

stopOutcome.title: Stop expense
stopOutcome.descriptionAttentionStop: Stopping expense, it will not be included in the budget from the date you provide.
stopOutcome.descriptionDeleteTitle: If you want to completely delete the expense,
stopOutcome.descriptionDeleteAttention: Remember, that completely deleting the expense may cause changes in the balances of the current and past budgets.

incomes.title: Incomes
incomes.additionalInfo: Add all incomes that replenish your budget. If the income is recurring, like a salary, add a recurring income. If the income is one-time, like a bonus, add a one-time income. You can also add a multiple income, if you know that it will occur a specific number of times.

stopIncome.title: Stop income
stopIncome.descriptionAttentionStop: Stopping income, it will not be included in the budget from the date you provide.
stopIncome.descriptionDeleteTitle: If you want to completely delete the income,
stopIncome.descriptionDeleteAttention: Remember, that completely deleting the income may cause changes in the balances of the current and past budgets.

noIncomesCard.title: You don't have any incomes yet
noIncomesCard.description: Add income, to control budget, track assets and achieve your financial goals.

removeIncome.title: Remove income
removeIncome.description: Are you sure you want to remove this income? This operation cannot be undone, and it may affect your account history, e.g. by changing the balance of the current or past budget.

addIncome.title: Create new income
addIncome.description: Add income, to control budget, track assets and achieve your financial goals.

dateField.label: Date
dateField.additionalInfo: This field specifies the date of occurrence. If you selected that it should be a recurring occurrence, this date specifies the first occurrence.

recurrenceField.label: Repeat every
recurrenceField.additionalInfo: This field allows you to configure the recurrence. If something occurs only once, select "one-time". If something occurs multiple times, select "recurring" and specify how often it should occur. In the case of selecting the recurring option, you must configure how many times and how often it should occur.

editIncome.title: Edit income
editIncome.description: Unfortunately, due to the correctness of the history of your incomes, not all fields can be changed. To fully edit the income, use the stop income or delete income option, and then create a new one.

dateField.label: Data
dateField.additionalInfo: This field specifies the date of occurrence. If you selected that it should be a recurring occurrence, this date specifies the first occurrence.

recurrenceField.label: Repeat every
recurrenceField.additionalInfo: This field specifies the frequency of occurrence. For example, if you select "every month", then every month the income for this purpose will be added to your budget.

budgetSummary.currentBudgetBalance: Balance with planned expenses in pouches

budgetSettings.title: Budget settings
budgetSettings.description: Change budget settings to match your needs.

intervalField.label: Interval
intervalField.additionalInfo: This field allows you to configure how often the budget should be opened. In other words, in what time intervals we will summarize your expenses and incomes.

startDateField.label: Start date
startDateField.additionalInfo: This field allows you to configure the first day of the budget period. In most cases, the best option will be the 1st day of the month, when you start working with the application.

transferPouchBalanceField.label: Transfer pouch balance
transferPouchBalanceField.additionalInfo: This field allows you to configure whether the balance in the pouch should be transferred to the next budget. In case of selecting the "yes" option, if you spend more than planned on a particular purpose (e.g. shopping) in a given month, the pouch in the next month will be decreased by that amount. It will also work in reverse - if you do not spend the planned amount, the balance in the next month will be increased by that amount.

tour.title: Welcome to the application
tour.description: This is a tour of the application. It will help you understand the application and start using it. You can skip it now, and start it at any time from the settings screen.

addFamily.title: Add your family
addFamily.description: The first step is to create a family profile and add users. Your account will be shared with the members of your family, which will allow you to manage finances together.
addFamily.alert: You must add at least one family, to continue

families.title: Family card
families.description: Here you will find your family card. You can be a member of several families at the same time. If you want to switch to another profile, click "Switch profile."

inviteUserToFamily.title: Invite user to family
inviteUserToFamily.description: This button will allow you to invite a user to your family. To do this, click on the invite user button and enter the user's email.

yourFamilyInvitations.title: Sent family invitations
yourFamilyInvitations.description: Here you will find the invitations to your family sent by you.

familyInvitations.title: Received family invitations
familyInvitations.description: Here you will find the invitations to your family received from other users.

goToBudgetPage.title: Go to budget page
goToBudgetPage.description: To discover the next features of the application, go to the budget page.

budgetSettings.title: Budget settings
budgetSettings.description: You can manage your budget: set the start day of the new budget, the frequency of starting the new budget and transferring the budget to the next month.

budgetItems.title: Go to budget items page
budgetItems.description: To configure your expenses and incomes, go to the budget items page.

addIncome.title: Add new income
addIncome.description: Add your first income, select whether it is one-time or recurring and enter its amount.
addIncome.alert: You must add at least one income, to continue

seeThisIncome.title: Income card
seeThisIncome.description: Income card contains information about its amount and frequency. You can edit it or delete it, but NOTE! Deleting an income that is recurring can affect the calculation of past budgets. When a recurring income stops, do not delete it, but rather stop it, to keep the history of your budgets unchanged.

addOutcome.title: Add new outcome
addOutcome.description: Add your first outcome, select whether it is one-time or recurring and enter its amount.
addOutcome.alert: You must add at least one outcome, to continue

seeThisOutcome.title: Outcome card
seeThisOutcome.description: Outcome card contains information about its amount and frequency. You can edit it or delete it, but NOTE! Deleting an outcome that is recurring can affect the calculation of past budgets. When a recurring outcome stops, do not delete it, but rather stop it, to keep the history of your budgets unchanged.

addPouch.title: Add new pouch
addPouch.description: Pouches are subaccounts, in which you can create different categories, such as: food, cosmetics, pets, etc. This helps you better control your expenses and do not exceed the set budget in a given category. If you selected the option of transferring pouch balances, then the amount of money that you do not spend in a given month will be transferred to the next one. On the other hand, if you spend more than the set amount, then the amount in the given category will be lower in the next month.
addPouch.alert: You must add at least one pouch, to continue

seeThisPouch.title: Pouch card
seeThisPouch.description: Pouch card contains information about its amount and frequency. You can edit it or delete it, but NOTE! Deleting a pouch that is recurring can affect the calculation of past budgets. When a recurring pouch stops, do not delete it, but rather stop it, to keep the history of your budgets unchanged.

goToBudgetSummary.title: Go to budget summary
goToBudgetSummary.description: See the summary of the current budget period, which is based on the data you have added.

seeBudgetTimeline.title: See budget timeline
seeBudgetTimeline.description: Check from when to when your current budget is.

seeBudgetBalance.title: See budget balance
seeBudgetBalance.description: Shows your budget balance in the current budget period. You can compare how much you have income and expenses. The balance includes all incomes and expenses, including those from pouches and planned goals.

budgetPouches.title: See budget pouches
budgetPouches.description: Shows the summary of all pouches - balance of expenses and remaining amount in pouches.

pouchOutcome.title: Add outcome in pouch
pouchOutcome.description: Add outcome to pouch in the selected category.
pouchOutcome.alert: You must add at least one outcome in pouch, to continue

pouchOutcomesList.title: Pouch outcomes list
pouchOutcomesList.description: You can view your outcomes in pouches here. Expand the list to see your outcomes in this pouch.
pouchOutcomesList.alert: You must expand the list of outcomes in pouch, to continue

pouchOutcomędit.title: Pouch outcome edit
pouchOutcomędit.description: You can edit or delete each outcome, to do this, use the highlighted buttons.

goToGoalsPage.title: Go to goals page
goToGoalsPage.description: To discover the next features of the application, go to the goals page.

addGoal.title: Add new goal
addGoal.description: Name your goal, enter the initial amount, the amount you want to collect and the frequency of saving. After adding the goal, the amount to save will be automatically included in the budget
addGoal.alert: You must add at least one goal, to continue

seeThisGoal.title: Goal card
seeThisGoal.description: Contains information about the goal, its amount and the sum of deposits, as well as a preview of the savings schedule. If in a given period you have saved more or less than planned, you can edit the goal outcome in this period and change the amount. The goal will then be automatically updated and recalculated depending on the remaining amount to complete.

editGoal.title: Goal edit
editGoal.description: You can edit, complete or delete the goal at any time.

goToFortunePage.title: Go to fortune page
goToFortunePage.description: To discover the next features of the application, go to the fortune page.

addFirstAsset.title: Add asset
addFirstAsset.description: Add asset, such as: house, cash or stocks.
addFirstAsset.alert: You must add at least one asset, to continue

seeThisAsset.title: Asset card
seeThisAsset.description: You can edit or delete each asset, to do this, use the highlighted buttons.

addFirstDebt.title: Add debt
addFirstDebt.description: Add debt, such as: mortgage or loan.
addFirstDebt.alert: You must add at least one debt, to continue

seeThisDebt.title: Debt card
seeThisDebt.description: You can edit or delete each debt, to do this, use the highlighted buttons.

seeAssetsCountCard.title: Assets count card
seeAssetsCountCard.description: Contains information about the value of all your assets.

seeDebtsCountCard.title: Debts count card
seeDebtsCountCard.description: Contains information about the value of all your debts.

seeNetWorthCard.title: Net worth card
seeNetWorthCard.description: Contains information about the value of your net worth.

financialCushionCard.title: Financial cushion card
financialCushionCard.description: Contains information about the value of your financial cushion.

livingAssetsCard.title: Living assets card
livingAssetsCard.description: Contains information about the value of living assets, such as: house, car, furniture, appliances, etc.

investmentsCard.title: Investments card
investmentsCard.description: Contains information about the value of investment assets, such as: stocks, bonds or deposits.

othersAssetsCard.title: Others assets card
othersAssetsCard.description: Contains information about the value of assets that do not fit in the other categories.

goToDashboardPage.title: Go to dashboard page
goToDashboardPage.description: To discover the next features of the application, go to the dashboard page.

dashboardFortuneCard.title: Fortune card
dashboardFortuneCard.description: Summary of your fortune: assets, debts, net worth.

dashboardHistoryOfFinancesCard.title: History of finances card
dashboardHistoryOfFinancesCard.description: You can view the history of your finances over this and previous budget periods.

dashboardGoalsCard.title: Goals card
dashboardGoalsCard.description: Allows you to monitor goals and their progress.

dashboardFinancialCushionCard.title: Financial cushion card
dashboardFinancialCushionCard.description: See the current state of your financial cushion. The application will calculate whether it is on a safe level compared to your expenses.
